thread.title: Lancaster Pollard Promotes Dopoulos to Senior Managing Director

author: cnbc.com
title: Lancaster Pollard Promotes Dopoulos to Senior Managing Director
text:
COLUMBUS, Ohio--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Lancaster Pollard has announced that Jason Dopoulos has been promoted to senior managing director. Dopoulos has been with the firm since 2007 and has managed the firm’s health care bankers in the Southwest since 2013. As part of his new role, he will now oversee banking efforts for the Northwest as well.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180212005782/en/
Jason Dopoulos manages the western U.S. for Lancaster Pollard. (Photo: Business Wire)
“Jason has been instrumental in the firm’s growth and has become a much-valued national presence for the firm,” said Kass Matt, president at Lancaster Pollard. “He is a clear leader, client advocate and an excellent mentor.”
As regional manager for the western U.S., Dopoulos will oversee Lancaster Pollard’s regional offices in Newport Beach, California; Denver, Colorado; and Bozeman, Montana. Matt Lindsay, senior vice president with the firm, will continue to be responsible for clients in Oregon, Washington and Alaska. Rob McAdams, vice president, will be responsible for clients in Colorado, Idaho, Montana and Wyoming. Ross Holland, vice president, will be the main point of contact for clients in Arizona, New Mexico, Utah and central California. Grant Goodman, vice president, will serve clients in Nevada and northern California.
Dopoulos has served as the chair of the National Investment Center (NIC) Future Leaders Council. He holds a master’s degree in business from the Fisher School of Business at The Ohio State University and a master’s in health administration from The Ohio State University College of Public Health.
Lancaster Pollard, a subsidiary of ORIX USA Corporation, helps health care and senior living providers expand and improve their services by delivering a full range of investment banking, mortgage banking, private equity, balance sheet financing and M&A advisory services.
